title: Creating A Winning Culture In Phoenix
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Kirk Goldsberry to discuss how the Suns are creating a culture of winning, the Hawks are turning things around and the idea of the NBA adopting the European soccer model of loaning players for a short time frame.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
